fullplot: A senior at an elite college, already under severe pressure to complete her thesis and land a prestigious job, must confront the sudden reappearance of her old boyfriend, after his two year, unexplained absence...
plot: A senior at an elite college, already under severe pressure to complete her thesis and land a prestigious job, must confront the sudden reappearance of her old boyfriend, after his two year...
title: Abandon

tomatoes.consensus: The plotline for Abandon is too disjointed and muddled to offer much in the way of thrills.
